name: 2-4 Player Bomberman
description:
I made my first multiplayer game.

No matter how hard I tried and got help, it turned out to be a very good project.

I am sure you will have a lot of fun playing with someone you love. please try and comment.

Good games already.

How to play?

Player One - WASD move, Q bomb 

Player Two - Arrow keys to move, Right Shift bomb 

Player Three - Number keys move, "-" key bomb 

Player Four -  JKLI move, spacebar bomb
